chapter.title: Prepare to Get Started
chapter.para: Before you get started using and sharing images, take a moment to review how to use API operations to send requests to and receive responses from Rackspace cloud services. Also, before you can use the &CImA;, you must first authenticate with the Rackspace cloud. This section shows you how to get an authentication token, which allows you to access the &CImS;. If you're already familiar with these activities and you have your authentication token, go to Getting Started.
